text: Conway Springs USD 356 is a public unified school district headquartered in Conway Springs, Kansas, United States. The district includes the communities of Conway Springs, Viola, Anson, and nearby rural areas. ==Schools== The school district currently has three schools: * Conway Springs High School * Conway Springs Middle School * Kyle Trueblood Elementary ==See also== * Kansas State Department of Education * Kansas State High School Activities Association * List of high schools in Kansas * List of unified school districts in Kansas ==References== ==External links== * Category:School districts in Kansas
title: Conway Springs USD 356
